job.command:
cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} setenv STARFPE NO # setenv NODEBUG yes starver .DEV2 # echo $INPUTFILE0 | grep ':' # if (! $?) then # set evtsFile = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $1}'` # set f = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` # set l = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $3}'` # else set evtsFile = $INPUTFILE0; set f = 1 set l = 5000000 # endif echo "${evtsFile}" set filel = `basename $evtsFile .daq` set output = ${filel}.event.root set daqout = ${filel}.root if (! -r ${evtsFile}) exit 1; set logFile = ${filel}B.log if ( -r $logFile) exit 0; set muFile = ${filel}.MuDst.root if (-r $muFile) exit 0;
#gnigmat. Static distrortions only (CorrX) #root.exe -q -b 'bfc.C(500000,"P2014a,gmt,gmtCosmics,gmtAligner,btof,-hitfilt,BEmcChkStat,CorrX,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,StiCA,KFVertex,evout","'${evtsFile}'","'$output'","'$daqout'")' >& ${logFile} #gnigmat. Dynamic distortions (CorrX+OSpaceZ2) #root.exe -q -b 'bfc.C(500000,"P2014a,gmt,gmtCosmics,gmtAligner,btof,-hitfilt,BEmcChkStat,CorrX,OSpaceZ2,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,StiCA,KFVertex,evout","'${evtsFile}'","'$output'","'$daqout'")' >& ${logFile} #gnigmat. Dynamic distortions (CorrX+OSpaceZ2+OGridLeak3D) root.exe -q -b 'bfc.C(500000,"P2014a,gmt,gmtCosmics,gmtAligner,btof,BEmcChkStat,CorrX,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeak3D,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,StiCA,KFVertex,evout","'${evtsFile}'","'$output'","'$daqout'")' >& ${logFile}
